mapper.select: SELECT M.NICKNAME, M.EMAIL, NVL(C.CREW_NAME, '없음') AS crewName, CASE WHEN M.ROLE = 'COMPANY' THEN 'COMPANY' WHEN CM.MEMBER_ID IS NULL THEN 'ALL' WHEN CM.IS_LEADER = 'Y' THEN 'LEADER' ELSE 'CREW' END AS crewRole FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN CREW_MEMBER CM ON M.MEMBER_ID = CM.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN CREW C ON CM.CREW_ID = C.CREW_ID WHERE M.ROLE != 'ADMIN' ORDER BY M.CREATED_AT DESC
